content.raw:
Could you increase the patch version number of labscript_utils by one and have the BLACS PR depend on the newer version so that we can encode this dependency in the version numbers?

I will have to remember to tag the labscript_utils merge commit with the new version number after merging.

Other than that I'm happy with this!
